fixes.name: Delta Down All CCY 9M CAD
fixes.dax_expression:
VAR condition =
    (
        'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[TERM_LABEL] = "9 Month"
        || 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[TERM_LABEL] = "9 Month Swap"
        || 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[TERM_LABEL] = "7 Month"
        || 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[TERM_LABEL] = "8 Month"
        || 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[TERM_LABEL] = "7 Month Swap"
        || 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[TERM_LABEL] = "8 Month Swap"
    )
    || (
        'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Market Subtype] = "Major Curve"
        && 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Risk Date # of Days] > 183
        && 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Risk Date # of Days] <= 274
    )
    || (
        'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Market Subtype] = "6m Basis"
        && 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Risk Date # of Days] > 183
        && 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Risk Date # of Days] <= 274
        && CONTAINSSTRING('Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[TERM_LABEL], "FRA")
    )
RETURN
IF(
    condition,
    'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Delta Down T CAD] + 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Fix Value T],
    0
)
fixes.solution_explanation: Converted the row-level IF...THEN...ELSE logic to a DAX calculated column. Translated CONTAINS(...) to CONTAINSSTRING(...). All column references were converted to the 'table'[column] format and the original logical structure was preserved.
